name: Golf Evolved
description:
A golf game played only with your Mouse! Drag your player to the ball, and the drag to shoot!

Shoutout to Paul E. Messier for helping out with music! Check him out at: https://soundcloud.com/paul-messier/tracks

A course with nine holes, each more difficult than the last. Can you put the ball in the hole? Test your skills in Golf Evolved!
